snp5.18:0.2: Verse of Praise for the Way to the Beyond
snp5.18:1.1: This was said by the Buddha while staying in the land of the Magadhans at the Pāsāṇake shrine. When requested by the sixteen brahmin devotees, he answered their questions one by one.
snp5.18:1.2: If you understand the meaning and the teaching of each of these questions, and practice accordingly, you may go right to the far shore of old age and death.
snp5.18:1.3: These teachings are said to lead to the far shore, which is why the name of this exposition of the teaching is “The Way to the Beyond”.
